item.title: Next.js
item.description: Next.js Next.js is a React full stack framework. It provides an ability to develop applications with server-side rendering and also can be used as a Static Site Generator. Creating a Next.js application (with TypeScript) For creating a Next.js application you need install Node and npm on your machine. if you didn’t do it before check out the post How To Install or Update Node by Using nvm (Node Version Manager).
